titleStmt.title: The loyall convert, (according to the Oxford copy.) A convert will be loyall: or, some short annotations on this book; / by W. Bridges. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Bridges, W., fl. 1644.
Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644. Loyall convert.

notesStmt.note: A reprinting of and reply to the work by Francis Quarles.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
